item.title: Multiple SSH Keys for Different GitHub Accounts
item.description: Introduction The Problem? The Solution Creating a new Key SSH Config Optional Shell Function Alternatives? Another Alternative Introduction I recently had an issue with my GitHub set-up which has since prompted me to write this post. The issue I had was dealing with multiple GitHub accounts via SSH on a single laptop. So I have a GitHub account under the username Integralist. This is a personal account, and up until recently I was also using it to access my work’s private repos (BBC and BBC-News).
